alert.note: Alert for Clarion; Forest; Venango (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 1:31PM EDT until July 24 at 1:45PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM EDT FOR VENANGO...NORTHWESTERN CLARION AND NORTHWESTERN FOREST COUNTIES... At 130 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Franklin, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. Locations impacted include... Oil City, Franklin, Sugarcreek, Tionesta, Hasson Heights, Seneca, Polk, Rouseville, Cooperstown, Kennerdell, Woodland Heights, and Pleasantville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This thunderstorm is capable of producing all types of severe weather including a quick tornado. Move to a safe shelter, such as an interior room, a bathroom or closet or basement. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
